name: duxca.lib.png.js
description: JavaScript PNG decoder written in TypeScript

scripts.setup: npm install -g typescript bower typings browserify watchify http-server
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: rm -rf bower_components typings node_modules; npm update; bower update; typings install
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib/* dist/* test/*.js; mkdir -p dist
scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc    -p ./ ; browserify lib/index.js --standalone PNG -o dist/index.js
scripts.start: npm run build; tsc -w -p ./ & watchify   lib/index.js --standalone PNG -o dist/index.js -v & http-server -s -p 8000

author: legokichi
